Package model

Class Discarded

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.Vector<E>
java.util.Stack<Card>
model.Discarded
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Card>, Collection<Card>, List<Card>, RandomAccess
public class Discarded extends Stack<Card>
Discarded is a Stack subclass that represents a pile of discarded cards in a card game.
Author:
Simone
See Also:
